subs.text: It‚Äôs with great pride that I congratulate my brother in graduating from the University of Victoria with a degree in computer engineering. I deeply admire his hard work and tenacity in accomplishing what he set out to do.

subs.text: Security at D gates was a breeze. I‚Äôm still good with arriving 3 hours early (and not the recommended 2). I‚Äôm glad I held myself back from arriving 4 hours early.
subs.rawText: Security at D gates was a breeze. I‚Äôm still good with arriving 3 hours early (and not the recommended 2). I‚Äôm glad I held myself back from arriving 4 hours early.

subs.text: An hour delay,with the plane stuck at the gate. It‚Äôs hard to get mad when there‚Äôs so much to do (read a book, watch a movie, try to catch the eye of the ground crew and wave at them).
subs.rawText: An hour delay,with the plane stuck at the gate. It‚Äôs hard to get mad when there‚Äôs so much to do (read a book, watch a movie, try to catch the eye of the ground crew and wave at them).

subs.text: I‚Äôm in the air now. Long flights are where I try to make a decision or two, deciding being the thing I hate doing the most.
subs.rawText: I‚Äôm in the air now. Long flights are where I try to make a decision or two, deciding being the thing I hate doing the most.

subs.text: I decided a bunch of small things on the flight, mostly consisting of changing ‚Äúwrite/think about‚Äù to ‚Äúdo one thing towards‚Äù in my repeating reminders. Something something cabin pressure makes you think if not better, then at least differently something something.

subs.text:
Posit: People think the economy might be shaky, leading to a recession.
Consequence: People start to reduce their spending.
Result: Pretty soon the economy *is* shaky, leading to a recession.
Conclusion: You can cause an economy to be shaky, leading to a recession.
subs.rawText:
Posit: People think the economy might be shaky, leading to a recession.
Consequence: People start to reduce their spending.
Result: Pretty soon the economy *is* shaky, leading to a recession.
Conclusion: You can cause an economy to be shaky, leading to a recession.

subs.text: I need to tell an interviewer for an internal talk show at work a little fun fact or something I‚Äôd like to share with people that they may not know about me. Something interesting that I‚Äôm not embarrassed about, obviously. What should I tell the interviewer?
subs.rawText: I need to tell an interviewer for an internal talk show at work a little fun fact or something I‚Äôd like to share with people that they may not know about me. Something interesting that I‚Äôm not embarrassed about, obviously. What should I tell the interviewer?

subs.text: I won a search engine contest in 2004. Is that interesting? I wanted to prove that having a blog was good for SEO. To encourage people to link to me, and so that some good could come of it, I promised I‚Äôd make a donation to charity if I won, a promise I kept.
subs.rawText: I won a search engine contest in 2004. Is that interesting? I wanted to prove that having a blog was good for SEO. To encourage people to link to me, and so that some good could come of it, I promised I‚Äôd make a donation to charity if I won, a promise I kept.

subs.text: Winning the search engine contest feels like of the few thing I set out to do, felt sure I could get done, and was right, and that was a long time ago. Everything else I can think of fell into my lap and all I had to do was say Yes.
subs.rawText: Winning the search engine contest feels like of the few thing I set out to do, felt sure I could get done, and was right, and that was a long time ago. Everything else I can think of fell into my lap and all I had to do was say Yes.

subs.text: I‚Äôm leaning towards requesting that the interviewer not ask the question.

subs.text: What are the predictions as to when there will be projections for the results of the Ontario election? Is there a place to bet on when projections will come from the various media entities? Is politics betting legal in Ontario? #onelxn #onpoli #ontariovotes #ontarioelection2022
subs.rawText: What are the predictions as to when there will be projections for the results of the Ontario election? Is there a place to bet on when projections will come from the various media entities? Is politics betting legal in Ontario? #onelxn #onpoli #ontariovotes #ontarioelection2022

subs.text: I had 9:17 PM as the time I bet that the first major media entity would project a majority government.
subs.rawText: I had 9:17 PM as the time I bet that the first major media entity would project a majority government.

subs.text: It‚Äôs over now. You don‚Äôt have to watch any of the election coverage any more. All the speeches will be on YouTube tomorrow. If it‚Äôs not your job to cover the election, you can literally do anything else if you so choose.

subs.text:
Reading was magical because:

1. You could tell who read something because of you.
2. You could see who was reading something from individual domains.
3. You could ‚ÄúYep‚Äù (heartily suggest something) or ‚ÄúNope‚Äù (recommend against something), and it had hooks for each.
subs.rawText:
Reading was magical because:

1. You could tell who read something because of you.
2. You could see who was reading something from individual domains.
3. You could ‚ÄúYep‚Äù (heartily suggest something) or ‚ÄúNope‚Äù (recommend against something), and it had hooks for each.
